examples.example: 我在商场捡到一个钱包，里面有很多重要证件，我马上交到了服务台。

translate.english: I picked up a wallet in the mall, there were many important documents inside, and I immediately handed it to the service desk.

examples.example: 我出门的时候不小心弄丢了钱包，还好有好心人捡到并归还给我。

translate.english: When I went out, I accidentally lost my wallet. Fortunately, a kind-hearted person picked it up and returned it to me.

examples.example: 我总是把钱包放在一个安全的地方，以免丢失。

translate.english: I always put my wallet in a safe place so as not to lose it.
